contentList.content: Sorcerous Burst

Cast sorcerous energy at one creature or object within range, dealning Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Psychic, or Thunder damage.

If you roll an 8 on a d8 for this spell, you automatically cast another spell that deals 1d8 damage. The maximum number of these extra spells you can cast automatically equals your spellcasting ability modifier.

Additional casts do not benefit from damage riders.
Sorcerous Burst: Psychic

Cast sorcerous energy at one creature or object within range.

If you roll an 8 on a d8 for this spell, you automatically cast another spell that deals 1d8 damage. The maximum number of these extra spells you can cast automatically equals your spellcasting ability modifier.

Additional casts do not benefit from damage riders.

Cast sorcerous energy at one creature or object within range.

If you roll an 8 on a d8 for this spell, you automatically cast another spell that deals 1d8 damage. The maximum number of these extra spells you can cast automatically equals your spellcasting ability modifier.

Additional casts do not benefit from damage riders.

Cast sorcerous energy at one creature or object within range.

If you roll an 8 on a d8 for this spell, you automatically cast another spell that deals 1d8 damage. The maximum number of these extra spells you can cast automatically equals your spellcasting ability modifier.

Additional casts do not benefit from damage riders.
Arcane Eruption

Churning magical energy explodes on a point you choose. Select the type of damage dealt by the explosion: Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, Poison, Psychic, or Thunder.

A random status out of Incapacitated, Blinded, Frightened, Poisoned, Charmed and Prone will be applied to the creatures who failed the save for 1 turn.
Arcane Eruption: Acid

Churning magical energy explodes on a point you choose, dealing Acid Damage.

A random status out of Incapacitated, Blinded, Frightened, Poisoned, Charmed and Prone will be applied to the creatures who failed the save for 1 turn.
Arcane Eruption: Thunder

Churning magical energy explodes on a point you choose, dealing Thunder Damage.

A random status out of Incapacitated, Blinded, Frightened, Poisoned, Charmed and Prone will be applied to the creatures who failed the save for 1 turn.
Arcane Eruption: Lightning

Churning magical energy explodes on a point you choose, dealing Lightning Damage.

A random status out of Incapacitated, Blinded, Frightened, Poisoned, Charmed and Prone will be applied to the creatures who failed the save for 1 turn.
Arcane Eruption: Fire

Churning magical energy explodes on a point you choose, dealing Fire Damage.

A random status out of Incapacitated, Blinded, Frightened, Poisoned, Charmed and Prone will be applied to the creatures who failed the save for 1 turn.
Arcane Eruption: Cold

Churning magical energy explodes on a point you choose, dealing Cold Damage.

A random status out of Incapacitated, Blinded, Frightened, Poisoned, Charmed and Prone will be applied to the creatures who failed the save for 1 turn.

Churning magical energy explodes on a point you choose, dealing Poison Damage.

A random status out of Incapacitated, Blinded, Frightened, Poisoned, Charmed and Prone will be applied to the creatures who failed the save for 1 turn.
